parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the EPS system can cause the steering wheel to stick or bind, making it difficult to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The steering wheel feels sticky or binds when turning
requiring extra pressure to turn the wheel
making it difficult to control the vehicle
especially at highway speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the LKA system can cause the steering wheel to shake or vibrate, making it difficult to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The steering wheel shakes or vibrates when the LKA system is engaged
making it difficult to control the vehicle
especially at highway speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering rack can cause the steering wheel to stick or bind, making it difficult to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: The steering wheel feels sticky or binds when turning
requiring extra pressure to turn the wheel
making it difficult to control the vehicle
especially at highway speeds.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Driver Side Mirror Vibration and Distortion
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vibration and distortion of the driver side mirror can cause blurred vision, making it difficult for the driver to see the road behind them, which can lead to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The driver side mirror vibrates at speeds of 40 mph or more
the mirror distorts the view
the mirror blurs the image
the mirror shakes
the mirror has a curved U-shape crack
the mirror has a sudden crack without apparent impact damage.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The sudden explosion of the sunroof can cause glass shards to fall into the vehicle, obstructing the driver's view and potentially causing accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The sunroof explodes while driving
the glass falls into the front seat
the sunroof cover is half open.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The inadequate horn can fail to alert other drivers or pedestrians, increasing the risk of accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The horn is faint
the horn is not audible
the horn is insufficient
the horn is not loud enough to provide proper warning.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Key Fob and Door Unlocking Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The key fob's inability to unlock only the driver's door can be a safety concern, especially for individuals who require this feature.
symptoms: The key fob unlocks all doors
the settings do not provide an option to unlock only the driver's door
the dealer is unable to resolve the issue.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The heated defrost feature can cause the mirror to crack, obstructing the driver's view and potentially causing accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The mirror cracks after using the heated defrost
the mirror has a sudden crack without apparent impact damage.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The resistance in the steering wheel can make it difficult to control the vehicle, increasing the risk of accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The steering wheel resists slight changes in direction
the steering wheel is stiff.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle stalling can cause accidents or near-misses, especially if it occurs on a busy road or highway.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls
the vehicle loses power.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The bubbling noise from the AC vent can be a distraction while driving, increasing the risk of accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The AC in heat mode makes a bubbling noise
the noise is coming from the driver side vent.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The vehicle's engine starting in a garage can cause exhaust fumes to build up, potentially leading to carbon monoxide poisoning or other health risks.
symptoms: The vehicle starts in a garage
the engine runs without the driver's knowledge
the garage fills with exhaust fumes.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The reverse camera's malfunction can cause accidents or near-misses, especially when reversing out of a parking space or driveway.
symptoms: The reverse camera turns black and white
the camera image switches randomly between color and black and white.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Water ingress into the rear camera can cause the camera to malfunction, making it difficult or impossible to see behind the vehicle while reversing, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Big blobs of water drops appear on the rear camera
making it impossible to see while backing up.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A distorted or black and white rear camera image can make it difficult for the driver to see obstacles or pedestrians behind the vehicle, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The rear camera image is usually black and white instead of color
strobes between black and white and color
lacks contrast.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A failed rear view mirror can obstruct the driver's view, making it difficult to see obstacles or pedestrians behind the vehicle, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The rear view mirror cracks or shatters without any external impact
obstructing the driver's view.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A distorted or vibrating side mirror can make it difficult for the driver to see obstacles or pedestrians alongside the vehicle, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The side mirror looks distorted
shakes significantly
or vibrates
making it difficult to see obstacles or pedestrians alongside the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A cracked side mirror can obstruct the driver's view, making it difficult to see obstacles or pedestrians alongside the vehicle, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The side mirror cracks without any external impact
obstructing the driver's view.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Frozen windshield washer fluid can reduce visibility while driving, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The windshield washer fluid freezes in cold temperatures
reducing visibility while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A failed windshield can obstruct the driver's view, making it difficult to see the road ahead, increasing the risk of accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The windshield explodes or shatters without any external impact
obstructing the driver's view.
